actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Budget pursuant to the order of January 30, 1975; to be reported by the Appropriations Committee pursuant to the provisions of S.Res.45 of the 94th Congress.

official_title: A bill making a rescission of certain funds for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982.

summary.text: Rescinds funds earmarked for the M-9 Armored Combat Earthmover under the Department of Defense Appropriation Act, 1982.

titles.title: A bill making a rescission of certain funds for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982.
